name.zh-Hans: 上海延安路中运量公交系统

desc.en: The Yan'an Road medium-capacity bus system is a quasi-bus rapid transit system in Shanghai, PRC, operated by trolleybuses. The system's main line starts from Shenkun Road Bus Terminal in the west and ends at East Yan'an Road the Bund in the east, mainly via Huqingping Highway and Yan'an Road, which is an east-west transverse ground transit corridor in Puxi, Shanghai; there are also the Hongqiao Business District Extension Line (which is served by the No. 71 Interval Line), three branch lines, and a shuttle line to SHA T2.
desc.zh-Hans: 延安路中运量公交系统，是中华人民共和国上海市的一条准快速公交系统，使用无轨电车运营。该系统主线西起申昆路枢纽站，东至延安东路外滩，主要途经沪青平公路与延安路，是上海浦西地区一条东西横贯的地面公交走廊；另有虹桥商务区延伸线（由71路区间担当）、三条支线以及一条前往虹桥机场T2航站楼的接驳线。

updateHistory.reason: New template of Shanghai Yan-an Road Medium-capacity Transit
